2100660.name: RC SIM 2022 Demo
2100660.description:
Welcome to the Multi-map World of RC Fun! Select from different types of remote control objects and play around in a sandbox style environment. Upcoming map editing as well as full controller support coming in the future!

Features:
*multiple maps
*multiple vehicles and objects
*destruction in future releases
*Possible Multiplayer support upcoming
*character and vehicle controls independent!
*more...
2100660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
